dead_kittypet_J1: My housefolk got a dog recently.
I miss them, but, wow... I'm glad I don't have to deal with that.
dead_kittypet_J2: My housefolk got a dog recently.
I miss them, but, wow... I'm glad I don't have to deal with that.
dead_kittypet_J3: You know, the way you Clan cats live your lives is... interesting.
Why not just find some housefolk? They're very nice, and you can enjoy all sorts of things, like warm blankets, free food, and all the cuddles you want.
Why are you making that face?
dead_kittypet_J4: Hi! Um, I think I lost my housefolk. You wouldn't know where they are, would you?
Oh, housefolk are, like, these big cats with no fur, and they walk on their back paws, and they have these big warm dens full of lots of stuff!
Mine are very nice. They were very happy to have me, I just don't know where they went...
[You tell the kit that you're sorry, but you don't think you can help them.]
Oh, okay, that's fine. I'll keep looking.
dead_kittypet_J5: [You find t_c near the Clan border, staring off into the trees.]
Oh! Hi, y_c. I'm just... looking.
I lost my housefolk forever ago, and I feel like I'll never find them, when I look at how big the world is.
Do you think they're around here, somewhere? They must be so sad without me...
dead_kittypet_J6: [As soon as they catch sight of you, t_c turns and sprints away. You run to catch up, almost losing their translucent pelt in the scenery.]
[They stop short of a weird hole in the ground and point to it.]
Here! Look! It's a pawprint from some housefolk! There's a bunch of them! They came from this way!
They don't smell familiar, but, maybe they're from my housefolk, and they've finally come looking for me!
[You ensure t_c that, yes, maybe that's true, and at the same time, make a mental note to inform the rest of the Clan about Twolegs on the territory.]
car_c: Sometimes I just sit here and make sure that the cars don't hit any cats.
They're usually pretty smart and slow down when they see anyone crossing the road... but I watch just in case.
[You don't understand most of the words that t_c is meowing.]
you_sc_they_ur_CM1: [You see a curious t_c peeking their head over the border. With a graceful leap, their misty paws hit the star-littered ground.]
Jee, you Clan cats are less scary than I thought you were.
Sad that I only figured that out once... you know...
[You offer the kittypet to hunt with you in StarClan for a while, and they cautiously accept, allowing you to show them the ropes. After a few catches, they return to their side of the border.]
Thank you, y_c! I had a lovely time, but I have to go back to watching over my housefolk. They still need me.
sckit_urnew_R1: [Oh! A tiny kittypet kit has wandered to the border you were playing at.]
[They toddle as fast as they can to your side and cuddle in. Maybe they're not a StarClan cat... But you can give them some company!]
[t_c drifts to sleep. Soon enough, so do you. When a queen finds you all alone later you don't mention the strange little visitor.]
sckit_urnew_R2: [You're retrieving a moss-ball from near the border when you notice a newborn kittypet kit with transparent, misty fur that waves softly.]
[They bap the mossball with a teeny tiny paw! Though they can't play properly, you invite t_c to join you and your friends for a bit. They're content with company.]
[It's sad to see them go later.]
